Package br.com.riziko.ncs.core.rules

################################################################################## This package must contain rules from North Atlantic Treaty Organization Group of National Directors on Codification Allied Committee 135 (AC/135) ACodP-1 NATO Manual on Codification January 2017 English version Issued by the NATO Support and Procurement Agency (NSPA) on behalf of The Group of National Directors on Codification(AC/135) Note: It is forbidden to put here tools for repeatable actions made by developers to support runtime processing.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ProcessingStudy
    Interface that stays NADEX transactions - Processing studies according ACodP-1/Jan2017 - Ss. 562.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    InputValidationControl
    Section 560 - Tables on Harmonized Outputs Referred to Corresponding Input Transactions This section contains tables showing within the international exchange of data all possible output related to corresponding input transactions and represented by the output DICs to be used or in case of a reject by the output DIC indicating the notification of return or unprocessable input package.
    RecommendedOutputBuilder
    It will generate Segment Q or Segment P with KRE or KRU answers.
    ValidateCharacter
    This Class validate according rules from Table 21 - Character Sub-set for the Exchange of NATO Codification Data | available characters are '.(+\&$*);-/,%_?
    ValidateLAR
    It will return error KRU / KRE transactions filled with recommended output according Sub-section 562.
    ValidateLAU
    It will return error KRU / KRE transactions filled with recommended output according Sub-section 562.
    ValidateLDU  
    ValidateLSA  
    ValidateLTI  
    ValidatePossibleDICOutput
    It checks if DIC Output (K) is acceptable for given DIC Input (L), according Sub-Section 524 - Input DICs cross-referenced to possible Output DICs
    ValidateReferenceNumber
    AcodP-1(2017) - Sub-Section 264 - Combination of Reference Number Category Code, Reference Number Variation Code and Document Availability Code 264.1 The compatibility between the Reference Number Category Code - RNCC - (DRN 2910), the Reference Number Variation Code - RNVC - (DRN 4780) and the Document Availability Code - DAC - (DRN 2640) in an Item Identification is determined, most of the time, by the type of item identification.
    ValidateSegment
    Validates ACODP-1, Chapter V, Segments according format Rules / It generate error when SegmentCode is null or blank, so InputHeader and OutputHeader will be skipped.

Package br.com.riziko.ncs.core.rules Description

################################################################################## This package must contain rules from North Atlantic Treaty Organization Group of National Directors on Codification Allied Committee 135 (AC/135) ACodP-1 NATO Manual on Codification January 2017 English version Issued by the NATO Support and Procurement Agency (NSPA) on behalf of The Group of National Directors on Codification(AC/135) Note: It is forbidden to put here tools for repeatable actions made by developers to support runtime processing. Tools must be put into '...tool' package. ##################################################################################
Author:
Rogerio
